snippet.title: Nara: Facing Fire - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Nara: Facing Fire on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/glowing-glade/nara-facing-fire-a-hand-drawn-fantasy-metroidvania
Nara: Facing Fire on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2087320/Nara_Facing_Fire

Nara: Facing fire is an upcoming fantasy metroidvania focused on exploration, fluid and responsive movement, difficult boss fights and thrilling escape sequences.
